issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem isn't valid and it can't be fixed.
resolution.name: Invalid

versions.description: Maintenance release with new AMQP support and smaller modules

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi,

I'm using the amqp_1_0 JMS API to publish a message to an embedded AMQP broker. But even though I think there's nothing wrong with this message, I get the following exception on producer.send():

java.lang.NumberFormatException: Value "2391065073150853120" lies outside the range [0-4294967296).

Is that a bug or am I doing something wrong ?

I'll write a JUnit Test case once I get some more time...

  Axel
